name: game_of_life
description: All dependencies of the GameOfLife project

scripts.build: eslint *.js && tslint *.ts && tsc && copyfiles -f node_modules/requirejs/require.js Imports && copyfiles Imports/**/*.js *.html *.css BuildOutput && karma start
scripts.quickBuild: tslint *.ts && tsc && copyfiles Imports/**/*.js BuildOutput && karma start
